name: Alien Playfield Loot Tradeskills
raw: The parts listed drop in various Alien Playfields and can be used for various tradeskill processes. ------------------------------ #L "Energy Redistribution Unit" "257961" recipes: ------------------------------ #L "Blades of Boltar" "/tell recipe 715" #L "De'Valos Lava Protection Ring" "/tell recipe 716" #L "Vektor ND Grand Wyrm" "/tell recipe 717" ------------------------------ #L "Visible Light Remodulation Device" "257964" recipes: ------------------------------ #L "Explosif's Polychromatic Pillows" "/tell recipe 718" #L "De'Valos Lava Protection Ring" "/tell recipe 719" #L "Scoped Salabim Shotgun Supremo" "/tell recipe 720" ------------------------------ #L "Dynamic Gas Redistribution Valves" "257962" recipes: ------------------------------ #L "High Lord of Angst" "/tell recipe 721" #L "Silenced Kyr'Ozch Rifle" "/tell recipe 722" #L "Amplified Sleek Cannon" "/tell recipe 723" ------------------------------ #L "Action Probability Estimator" "257960" recipes: ------------------------------ #L "Nophex's Molybdenum Crash Helmet" "/tell recipe 724" #L "Extruder's Molybdenum Crash Helmet" "/tell recipe 725" #L "Sworn Knight Commander Genevra's Helmet" "/tell recipe 726" #L "Conscientious Knight Commander Nizno's Helmet" "/tell recipe 727" #L "S13 Upgraded Combined Headwear" "/tell recipe 728" ------------------------------ #L "Notum Amplification Coil" "257963" recipes: ------------------------------ #L "Twice Augmented Hellspinner Shock Cannon" "/tell recipe 729" #L "ObiTom's Nano Calculato" "/tell recipe 730" #L "Amplified Kyr'Ozch Carbine" "/tell recipe 731" ------------------------------ #L "Inertial Adjustment Processing Unit" "257959" recipes: ------------------------------ #L "Hadrulf's Viral Belt Component Platform" "/tell recipe 580" ------------------------------ #L "Hacker ICE-Breaker Source" "257968" recipes: ------------------------------ #L "Intrusion Countermeasure Electronics Upgrade" "/tell recipe 581"
